name: One Shot (PawnProduction)
description:
Introduction

OneShoot is a 2D top down shooter where you play as a cowboy who wants to protect his farm from the cartel. But, you have only one shot remaining. Every end of wave, you can upgrade your bullet to make more kill !

How to play

You just need a keyboard and a mouse !

  • ZQSD : Move
  • Left Click : Fire
  • Mouse Movement : Aim

Crédits

Main Menu Music : OkamiDeluxe [Youtube Link]

Gameplay Music : Loeder [Youtube Link]

Thank's you for playing ! And don't forget to make a valuable feedback to improve the game !
